1: Old Man of the Mountain historical site

--------------------
Text: Franconia Notch State Park:  Attractions in the state park include the Flume Gorge and visitor center, the Old Man of the Mountain historical site, fishing in Echo Lake and Profile Lake, and miles of hiking, biking and ski trails.
